data.zone_id: * (required; id of the cam's zone, as provided by the db) *
data.address: * (optional; insert the address of the specific cam: the more accurate the address, the better) *
data.cam: * (optional; insert a unique id for the cam within the zone) *
data.latitude: * (optional; insert the string latitude coordinated of the cam) *
data.longitude: * (optional; insert the string longitude coordinated of the cam) *
